name: check_email
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool email_checker_and_validator.
Tool description: Use this API to validate the email addresses for your business. This endpoint will check syntax and will validate deliverability.

When an email address is valid, an object is returned containing a normalized form of the email address (which you should use!) and other information.
API description: Validates an email address using the RapidAPI Email Checker and Validator service.
